name: BEST WESTERN Augusto's Rio Copa

reviews.text: We stayed here for three nights. Location is good - very easy access to Copacabana beach. Meridian is a good landmark.
reviews.title: Good budget option

likes.liked: — the doorman excelled in customer care
likes.disliked: — taxi to beach locations has to go north via tunnel - not good if traffic is busy

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rooms are comfortable and well equipped and ours was a good size. Reception quite good, but the star of the show is the guy on the door. Like having your dad look after you - not just getting the taxi, but making sure the meter is on, and telling you very loudly how much it should cost, just in case the taxi driver has other ideas!
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: Breakfast good, but the restaurant is a bit soul-less so we didn't feel inclined to try the buffet dinner or lunch. The 'bar' is in the restaurant - no atmosphere at all. Pool and gym are tiny. Nothing special but a good choice for a safe, clean, comfortable budget location close to beach.
reviews.title: Good Alternative to Higher Priced Hotels Along the Beach

reviews.text: Stopped at the Best Western Rio Copa on our honeymoon - great hotel, great location, great breakfast.
reviews.title: Very good option for Copacabana
Good value
reviews.text: Outside are buses to most places in Rio - more fun than the taxis and lot's cheaper!

aka: Best Western Rio Copa Hotel Rio De Janeiro
description: The Best Western Rio Copa Hotel is located just two blocks away from the world famous Copacabana beach. We are the ideal choice for visitors wishing to stay near the major Rio de Janeiro attractions. The Best Western Rio Copa Hotel offers wonderfully decorated rooms, full service restaurant, swimming pool and meeting facilities. Enjoy one of the world's favorite tourist destinations at the Best Western Rio Copa Hotel.
